name: PixelJunk™ Eden
description: Swing, climb, and jump your way through massive “gardens” of vibrant other-worldly plant-life in this truly organic platformer.
minimum_requirements: OS:Windows XP, Vista, 7 Processor:Performance equivalent to Core™2 Duo. SS3 required. Memory:512 MB RAM Graphics:5 years or younger. Integrated graphics and very low budget cards may not work. OpenGL 2.1. DirectX®:dx90c Hard Drive:４４６ MB HD space
